sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import '../styles/Filter.css' import { useState,useEffect } from 'react'; export default function Filter() { const [restaurants,setRestaurants]=useState([]) const [location,setLocation]=useState([]) const [filter,setFilter]=useState({ city:'', name:'', lcost:'', hcost:'', sort:1 }) const handleSort=(sort)=>{ filter.sort=sort; setFilter({...filter}) } const handleCost=(lcost,hcost)=>{ filter.lcost=lcost; filter.hcost=hcost; setFilter({...filter}) } const handleLocation=(e)=>{ console.log(e.target.value) if(e.target.value) filter.city_name=(e.target.value) else{ filter.city_name=0 } setFilter({...filter}) } const handleCuisine=(e)=>{ if(e.target.checked) filter.name=(e.target.name) else{ filter.name=0 } setFilter({...filter}) } useEffect(()=>{ fetch(`http://localhost:9090/location`, {method:'GET'}) .then(response=>response.json()) .then(data=>setLocation(data.data)) },[]) useEffect(()=>{ fetch(`http://localhost:9090/restaurant/filter/1`, {method:'POST', headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'}, body:JSON.stringify(filter) }).then(response=>response.json()) .then(data=>setRestaurants(data.data)) },[filter]) return (

breakfast Places in Mumbai

select location

cuisine

handleCuisine(e)} />North Indain
handleCuisine(e)} />South Indian
handleCuisine(e)} />Chinese

handleCuisine(e)} />Street Food

handleCost(0,500)}/>less than 500
handleCost(500,1000)}/>500 to 1000
handleCost(1000,1500)}/>1000 to 1500
handleCost(1500,2000)}/>1500 to 2000
handleCost(2000,3000)}/>2000+

Sort

handleSort(1)}/>Price low to high
handleSort(-1)}/>Price high to low
